snippet: Members of the oil exporting cartel decided to keep the target for production at 30 million barrels a day, a move the markets had expected.
abstract: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries, or OPEC, decides to maintain its current target for oil production at 30 million barrels a day in move markets expected.

byline.contributor: Clifford Krauss contributed reporting from Houston.

lead_paragraph: Members of the oil exporting cartel decided to keep the target for production at 30 million barrels a day, a move the markets had expected.

headline.main: OPEC Maintains Its Target for Daily Oil Production
headline.print_headline: OPEC Maintains Its Target For Daily Oil Production

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations
